name: KemonoQ Demo
description:
Once upon a time…

A righteous knight hunted down evil,  but was blind to the darkness behind her. 

A valiant soldier lived with honor,  but was betrayed by his own code. 

And a young prince sought vengeance, but was destroyed by his own hatred. 

Three puppets of fate meet at destiny’s crossroads  And with the actors gathered, the play begins…

website/tumblr/twitter/instagram/patreon

KemonoQ is a JRPG dungeon crawler in development, focused around equippable passive and powerful active effects. With a major focus on gameplay without neglecting its setting and characters, KemonoQ tells a dark tale of irony, while offering an engaging gameplay experience. 

This is the first public alpha build release, and we look forward to hearing any ideas for improvement upon the concept!

If you enjoyed the demo please consider supporting PixelDream on Patreon!

Special thanks

This demo wouldn’t be possible without any of these dungeon crawlers!

  • Yanfly- State ideas, YEP library, plus the materialization of the heart container system!
  • Liquidize - State ideas, tons of state implementation help and heart container system tweaks!
  • LucStamrah- Breathing life into KemonoQ’s setting by providing all music tracks!
  • Aekashics- Character/setting design, overall concept and implementation!
  • Vistrom - Overall concept, trailer and production!
  • Archeia - Map sprite for the boss in KemonoQ's concept dem
